title: List of all Androidcloud   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidcloud   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: cloudrail-si-android-sdk
repoList.description: Unified API Library for: Cloud Storage, Social Log-In, Social Interaction, Payment, Email, SMS, POIs, Video & Messaging. Included services are Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, OneDrive for Business, Box, Egnyte, PayPal, Stripe,  Google Places, Foursquare, Yelp, YouTube, Vimeo, Twitch, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Line, Viber, Facebook, GitHub, Google+, LinkedIn, Slack, Twitter, Windows Live, Yahoo, Mailjet, Sendgrid, Twilio, Nexmo, Twizo.

repoList.name: TagCloudLinkView
repoList.description: Android Library TagCloud LinkView.

repoList.name: speed-test-lib
repoList.description: :cloud: JSpeedTest : speed test client library for Java/Android

repoList.name: ChipCloud
repoList.description: Android UI library that creates 'chip' clouds

repoList.name: DrupalCloud
repoList.description: DrupalCloud is a library for native Android applications to communicate with Drupal web services.

repoList.name: Google-Cloud-TTS-Android
repoList.description: Google Cloud Platform Text To Speech library use API_KEY on Android Example.

repoList.name: gcm-android-client
repoList.description: A library which helps you register Google Cloud Messaging tokens and listen for GCM messages.

repoList.name: SimpleGCM
repoList.description: Simple Google Cloud Messaging(GCM) integration library for Android.

repoList.name: android-print
repoList.description: Android Google Cloud Print Library

repoList.name: Java-fcm
repoList.description: Java wrapper library to send messages to Android clients through Firebase Cloud Messaging
